source.8ec7ce6c:
Total=matches.groupby('team1')['id'].count()+matches.groupby('team2')['id'].count()
print(Total)#total matches each team played
print('---------------')
win=((matches['winner'].value_counts()/Total)*100).sort_values() # % of win =win/total *100 
print(win)
print(win.index)
source.45c25cb2:
plt.figure(figsize=(10,10))
plt.bar(win.index,win)
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.title("WIN % BY TEAM")

source.9146a4b0:
mi_bat=mi_dc[(mi_dc['winner']=='MI') & (mi_dc['win_by_runs']!=0)]
print('total matches mi vs dc '+ str(len(mi_dc)))
mi_ball=mi_dc[(mi_dc['winner']=='MI') & (mi_dc['win_by_wickets']!=0)]
print('no. of matches mi won by batting first '+str(len(mi_bat)))
print('no. of matches mi won by batting second '+str(len(mi_ball)))
dc_bat=mi_dc[(mi_dc['winner']=='DC') & (mi_dc['win_by_runs']!=0)]
dc_ball=mi_dc[(mi_dc['winner']=='DC') & (mi_dc['win_by_wickets']!=0)]
print('no. of matches dc won by batting first '+str(len(dc_bat)))
print('no. of matches dc won by batting second '+str(len(dc_ball)))
